channel.title: Command Help
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Hey guys i'm coding a 667 Rsps and this is what i got off the top of my head for a ::melee command for pking ALL HELP APPRECIATED [/size] My code off the top of my head:
http://prntscr.com/1dto48
Compiler Error:
http://prntscr.com/1dto3d
EDIT: i also need help changing the skills u start at like so i can start at 99 atk, str, def, pray, mage, and range so i dont have to unlock ::master too all
Also Changing Server Messages {news}

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Got this from a zenith source:

[code]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“melee”)) {
player.getInventory().addItem(ID, AMOUNT);

			return true;
		}[/code]

In your command there probably shouldn’t be a " . " between equals and IgnoreCase.

and I think you can add this for the skills:

if (player.getRights() >= 0) { player.getSkills().addXp(SKILL ID, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP); player.getSkills().addXp(SKILL ID, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP); return true; }

I compiled that and didn’t get any errors so gl

and for the server news, just search part or all of it in the source file and it should pop up with whatever file it is in.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Remove the semicollon at the end of the if-statement.
Add a catch-block to your try-block.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Post your entire class. Even though, you probably don’t considering the compiler is telling you what is exactly wrong.

error: ‘(’ expected - you should put a starting parentheses there.
error: ‘)’ expected - you should put a closing parentheses there.

You can figure out most of your errors just by looking at the compiler output and Google.

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
item.description:
@Damoiscool wrote:

Can i see your commands.java? Thats definitely where the problem is

Read full topic
